caption.p: The determination of the antioxidant activity of (a) the leaf extract and (b) Trolox. Graphs plotted for the concentration of substance in mg/mL versus percentage of the inhibition of DPPH. The determination of ferrous chelating activity of (c) the leaf extract and (d) EDTA. Graphs plotted for the concentration of substance in mg/mL versus percentage of ferrous ion chelating effect.
